front.title: GMPLS RSVP-TE Extensions for OTN and SONET/SDH OAM Configuration

abstract.t: GMPLS has been extended to support connection establishment in both SONET/SDH [RFC4606] and OTN [RFC4328] networks. These documents do not support the configuration of the supervision functions. Both SONET/SDH and OTN implement supervision functions to qualify the transported signals. [GMPLS-OAM-FWK] defines a technology-agnostic framework for GMPLS to support the establishment and configuration of pro-active OAM monitoring of signalled connections. This document defines extensions to RSVP-TE for SONET/SDH and OTN OAM configuration.
